100480.「おぅ！ いたいた ラスタ！\n そろそろ 帰ってこいよ……:
Oh! There you are, Rasta! You should be home
by now...

100491.「おい ラスタ……。こりゃあ\n いったいぜんたい どうなってやがる？\n お前:
Hey, Rasta... what the hell is going on here?
You... now you're dancing...

100495.「グワッハハハ！ いやぁ おどれぇたぜ！\n まっさか この目で 伝説の除霊踊り:
Gwahahahaha! Well, you got me! I never thought
I'd see the legendary exorcism dance with my
own eyes!

100496.「最近のお前は なんてぇか\n ひと皮むけた感じが してたけどよ。\n こりゃあ:
Lately you've been looking like you've peeled
off a skin or something. This is more than
just a peel!

100498.「どうりで 合方をほしがるわけだぜ。\n 除霊踊りなら ふたりって相場が決まって:
No wonder they want a partner. It's a given
that they'll want two for the exorcism dance.
It's that dance of old legends...

100499.「にしても いったい どこで覚えたんだ？\n それに さっきの怨霊……なのか？\:
But where on earth did you learn that? And
that grudge...? I think it was something about
Kokuen-oh...

100500.「さ……さあ。そんなこと言ってたかしら。\n あの踊りは 昔 おばあさまに 教わ:
C...come on. Did I say that? My grandmother
taught me that dance a long time ago. I didn't
think it really worked. Such...

100503.「なんでもないわ……。\n さっきの戦いで すこし ひねっただけよ。:
It's nothing... just a slight twist from the
fight earlier.

100504.「あちゃあ……。やっちまったな！\n こりゃ 次の舞台は ドタキャン伝説だな。:
Oh, no... I'm screwed! The next performance
will be a legend of cancellation.

100505.「バカ言わないで！ これくらいのケガで\n 舞台を降りてたら プロ失格よ。\n:
Don't be silly! It's unprofessional to leave
the stage with an injury like this. The
audience is looking forward to seeing you...

100506.「……ダメだ。これくらいだろうと なんだろうと\n ケガはケガだ。プロデューサー:
It's no good. An injury is an injury no matter
how bad it is. As a producer, I can't just
overlook it.

100508.「デーモンも モーモンもねぇ！\n まぁ なんとかしてやりてぇが……ひねった\n:
No Demon, no Teeny Sanguini! Well, I'd like to
do something about it, but it takes longer to
heal from a sprain than you'd think.

100509.「伝説的スピードで 治す方法でもあれば\n いいんだがよ……。:
If only there was some way to fix it with
legendary speed...

100510.「まてよ……。そういえば伝説に……。\n グワッハハハ！ そうか。その手があった:
Wait... come to think of it... legend has
it... guwahahahaha! I see. I didn't know you
had it in you.

100511.「おい <pc>。\n わりぃが この後 テントまで来てくれ。\n 俺ぁ ラスタ:
Hey <pc>. Excuse me, but you're gonna
have to come by the tent after this. I'll just
grab my rasta and go ahead.

100512.「ちいーっと 頼まれてほしいことがあるんで\n 手を貸しちゃくれねぇか？\n 伝:
Hey, can you help me with something I need you
to do? I've got a legendary idea.<yesno><close>

100513.「グワッハハハ！ こんな状況下でも\n 空気読まずに 冗談かますたぁな。\n や:
Gwahahahaha! Even under such circumstances, you can make a joke without reading the air. I guess the best of the best have a different
taste.

100514.「まぁ……冗談は さておきだ。\n チカラを貸してくれよ。なっ！\n このとーり:
Well... let's put the jokes aside. Let's see
what you can do. Hey! That's right!<yesno><close>

100515.「グワッハハハ！ 恩に着るぜ。\n さっすが 俺の見込んだ 踊り子よ。\n それ:
Gwahahahaha! I'm in your debt. You're the
dancer I always knew you'd be. I'll be waiting
for you in the tent!

100516.「おぅおぅ ラスタ。\n 景気わりぃ 顔してやがんな。:
Oh, oh, Rasta. You're looking a little down in
the dumps, aren't you?

100517.「景気ね……。次のステージで 私が踊らなければ\n それこそ 悪くなる一方だと:
The economy... if I don't dance on the next
stage, it's only going to get worse, don't you
think? I've had enough of Bread Ears.

100518.「あのなぁ……ラスタ。無理して踊って\n もしものことが あってみろ……。\n:
You know...Rasta. If you dance too hard and
something happens to you... you'll be the
legend of Bread's ear forever, you know?

100519.「わかってるけど……ダメなのよ！\n これくらい…… これくらいで\n 踊れない:
I know, but... it's no good! If you can't
dance like this... like this... then I'm...!

100520.「まぁ……\n わかってらぁ。お前のことだ。\n このまま あきらめるワケもねぇ:
Well... you know what I mean. I'm talking
about you. There's no way you're going to give
up now, is there?

100524.「グワッハハハハ！ 急に 葉っぱ渡されても\n なんのこっちゃ わかんねぇよな。:
Gwahahahahaha! I don't know what it's all about if someone suddenly hands me a leaf. Don't be surprised to hear that. This is the
legendary...

100525.「カイユの葉じゃない！ \n どうして これを……？:
That's not a Recovery Leaf! How did you get
this...?

100527.ラスターシャは カイユの葉を\n足首に はりつけた。: Rastasha glued a Recovery Leaf to her ankle.

100528.「痛みを 優しく包み込むような\n この あたたかさ……ホンモノね。:
This warmth that gently embraces the
pain...it's real.

100529.「まさか あなた……。\n 私のために わざわざ\n あんな 危険なところに……:
Don't tell me you... went all the way out
there to put yourself in harm's way for me?

100530.「まったく……。\n ナッチョスといい あなたといい……\n お人好しも いいと:
I must say... like Nachos and you... you're a
real softy.

100531.「よかった……これなら舞台に立てる。\n お客さんを がっかりさせずに済むわ……:
Thank God...I can go on stage now. I won't
disappoint the audience...!

100532.「か……勘違いしないでよね。\n 今回の件と あなたの実力を\n 認めるかどうか:
Oh...don't get me wrong. Whether or not I
recognize your competence in this matter is
another story!

100533.「あなたなんて まだまだ 半人前なんだから。\n あまり 調子に乗らないでよ？:
You're still only half a man. Don't get too
carried away, okay?

100534.「お…おい ラスタ！？\n その態度は いくらなんでも……。: Hey, Rasta! That's no way to behave...

100535.「まぁでも……お礼は言っておくわ。\n 今は なんだか……無性に踊りたい気分なの:
Well, but... thank you. Right now I'm in the
mood to dance. Thank you.

100536.「じゃあ ステージ行ってくるわ。: Okay, I'm off to the stage.

100538.「いやあ よかった よかった！\n ケガも よくなって 食いぶち確保！\n パン:
Oh, thank God, thank God! My injury is better,
and I have food! I'm out of the life of Bread.

100539.「ラスタと <pc>も\n ほんのちっとは 打ち解けたみてぇだしよ。\n めでた:
Rasta and <pc> seem to have gotten
along just a little bit better. I'm so happy
for you.

100540.「しかし……まだ お前のこと\n 半人前とか 言ってたな。\n まさか これでも:
But...he still called you half a man. I didn't
think even this wasn't enough...

100541.「まぁ 本人が ああ言ってんなら 仕方ねぇ。\n 今回は トホホのホイミンだが:
Well, if she says so, I can't blame her. I'm
sorry to hear that you're a dancer of the
first rank...

100542.「しんぼう強く ラスタに示し続けりゃあ\n さすがに 納得しねぇワケには いかね:
If we continue to show Rasta how strong we are, we can't afford not to agree with him. Next time, let's be recognized as the best
mating partner!

103107.「こいつは 今回の件の礼だ。気に入るかは\n わからねぇが とりあえず 受け取っ:
This is a thank-you for what you did this
time. I don't know if you'll like it, but take
it anyway.

106874.「ああ あいつか？ 死んじゃいねえみたいだな。\n 心配いらねぇよ。ちょっくら:
Oh, that guy? Looks like he's not dead. Don't
worry about it. I'll call my companion to take
care of him. But that's not the point.

118062.ナッチョスは 倒れたオーガを運ぶ\n仲間を見届けると ラスターシャを\nかついで:
Nachos' watched his companion carry the fallen
ogre, then returned to the Lion Gate tent,
carrying Rastasha.
